PROJECTS.title: ⛪ Converge Church
PROJECTS.description: A church website with live streaming, realtime video conferencing, dynamic rendering via Pug.js, interactive calendar, user-friendly spreadsheet-database system via Airtable, photo gallery, web form validation + sanitization, and responsive design.

PROJECTS.title: 📅 Punschedule
PROJECTS.description: Punschedule is an easy way for Punahou students to automatically generate, customize, and download their Punahou School distance learning schedules.

PROJECTS.title: 💌 Mahalograms
PROJECTS.description: Mahalograms allows students to send virtual thank you cards at the end of the school year to fellow students and teachers.

PROJECTS.title: 😷 Face Masks for Hawaii
PROJECTS.description: Give, receive, and exchange face masks with nearby community members.
